titles.title: School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019
To ensure public disclosure of nutrition standards compliance by school food authorities, and for other purposes.
School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
School Nutrition Transparency for Healthy Kids Act of 2019
This bill requires that each state educational agency annually publish on the Department of Agriculture website data on the compliance of school food authorities with respect to nutritional requirements, including
the number of school food authorities in compliance with such requirements, disaggregated by state; the total number of such authorities in each state; and the percentage of such authorities in compliance with such requirements, disaggregated by state.
